name: databricksClusterTask
description: Configures a Databricks Cluster (Analytics Workload) in your workspace-TEST
helpMarkDown: Deploys a cluster from a JSON config file (generate from Databricks UI)-TEST
author: Data Thirst Ltd

inputs.name: authMethod
inputs.label: Authentication Method
inputs.helpMarkDown: How should we authenticate to Databricks? Complete all displayed fields.

inputs.name: bearerToken
inputs.label: Databricks bearer token
inputs.helpMarkDown: API Key - see your user account in your Databricks Workspace

inputs.name: applicationId
inputs.label: Application Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Service Principal that has access to Databricks (Contributor)

inputs.name: spSecret
inputs.label: Service Principal Secret
inputs.helpMarkDown: Secret key for your service principal

inputs.name: resourceGroup
inputs.label: Resource Group Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Resource Group Name of your Databricks Workspace

inputs.name: workspace
inputs.label: Databricks Workspace Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Databricks Workspace Name (as shown in Azure Portal)

inputs.name: tenantId
inputs.label: Tenant ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Tenant ID for the Azure Subscription

inputs.name: region
inputs.label: Azure Region
inputs.helpMarkDown: The location of your workspace as seen in workspace URL - for example westeurope

inputs.name: sourcePath
inputs.label: JSON Config File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the file containing your cluster configuration (generate from the UI and save in your repo)

OutputVariables.name: DatabricksClusterId
OutputVariables.description: This is the ClusterId created/edited for use in other requests
